definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: These strategies include buying raw materials in bulk and by mechanizing their operations.
sentences.chinese: 這些策略包括購買原材料和散裝機械化經營。

sentences.english: C. One of our main tasks now is to mechanize agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 當前的主要任務之農業機械化。

sentences.english: The conventional planting model of small-sized plantations cannot match modernised mechanisation management.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的小農種植模式與現代的機械化管理不匹配。

sentences.english: The status of machinery tea production in Shaoxing city was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了紹興市茶葉生產機械化工作的成就和現狀。

sentences.english: Separate mechanized divisions and tank battalions for infantry divisions were also formed.
sentences.chinese: 同時獨立的機械化師和步兵師屬坦克營也開始組建。

sentences.english: A feeding funnel is added, and the mechanized drying for dilute fluid is realized.
sentences.chinese: 並增加了進料斗，使稀液體的烘乾實現機械化。

sentences.english: An improvement of output per worker has been achieved, due to mechanization.
sentences.chinese: 由於機械化，每個工人的生產量有了提高。

sentences.english: "That is correct, " it said in its mechanized little voice.
sentences.chinese: “你說得對，”機器人用他那機械化的小嗓門說道。

sentences.english: Both in China and India, small farm sizes inhibit mechanization.
sentences.chinese: 在中國和印度，農場規模小都對機械化有抑制作用。

sentences.english: Another project that is based on machine vision relates to the location of macadamia nuts.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個項目，則是針對澳大利亞堅果的機械化收穫。

sentences.english: Now my family condition is getting better and all farm work is done by machines.
sentences.chinese: 現在，家境稍微好些，地裏農活也是機械化了。

sentences.english: Farming in New Zealand is highly mechanized .
sentences.chinese: 牧業在新西蘭是高度機械化的。

sentences.english: Mechanized scale root peeling and grating technologies.
sentences.chinese: 機械化木薯削皮及粉碎技術。

sentences.english: The fundamental way out for agriculture lies in mechanization.
sentences.chinese: 農業的根本出路在於機械化。

sentences.english: Mechanization happened years ago on the farms of Islay.
sentences.chinese: 數年前，艾萊的農場就實現了機械化。

definition: socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
lit. fight minutes, snatch seconds (idiom); a race against time/making every second count
normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
